Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.repositories

Interface ChargeRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ChargeEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ChargeEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<ChargeEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<ChargeEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ChargeEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ChargeEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ChargeEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface ChargeRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ChargeEntity,Long>
This interface is the repository of.

  • Method Details

    • findAllFinesByLotId

      @Query("SELECT c FROM charge c where c.fineId <> null and c.lotId = :lotId") Optional<List<ChargeEntity>> findAllFinesByLotId(Long lotId)
      Returns an Optional list of Load Entities that are of type Fine associated to a lot.
      Parameters:
      lotId - the lot associated with the Fine charge.
      Returns:
      an optional list of Charge Entities that are of type Fine of a specific lot.

    • findByFineId

      Optional<ChargeEntity> findByFineId(Long fineId)
      Search for a Charge of type Fine by the id of the Fine associated to a lot.
      Parameters:
      fineId - Id of the Fine registered as a charge.
      Returns:
      an Optional of a ChargeEntity that is of type Fine of a specific lot.

    • getChargeEntitiesByDescription

      List<ChargeEntity> getChargeEntitiesByDescription(String description)
      Return a list of Charge Entities by their description.
      Parameters:
      description - the description.
      Returns:
      a list of Charge Entities.

      List<ChargeEntity> getChargeEntitiesByCategoryCharge(CategoryChargeEntity categoryCharge)
      Return a list of Charge Entities by their Category.
      Parameters:
      categoryCharge - the category of the charge.
      Returns:
      A list of Charge Entities

    • findByPeriodAndCategoryCharge

      List<ChargeEntity> findByPeriodAndCategoryCharge(PeriodEntity period, CategoryChargeEntity categoryCharge)
      Returns a list of Charge Entities by. their Category and by the Period they belong to.
      Parameters:
      categoryCharge - the category of the charge.
      period - to which the charge belongs.
      Returns:
      a list of Charge Entities.

    • findByPeriodAndLotId

      List<ChargeEntity> findByPeriodAndLotId(PeriodEntity period, Long lotId)
      Retrieves a list of ChargeEntity objects associated with a specific period and lot ID.
      Parameters:
      period - the period for which charges are being queried, represented as a PeriodEntity.
      lotId - the ID of the lot for which charges are being queried.
      Returns:
      a list of ChargeEntity.

    • findMostFrequentCategoryWithAmount

      @Query("SELECT cc.categoryCharge.name AS mostFrequentCategory, SUM(cc.amount) AS mostFrequentCategoryAmount FROM charge cc WHERE cc.period.periodId = :periodId GROUP BY cc.categoryCharge.name ORDER BY COUNT(cc.categoryCharge.name) DESC LIMIT 1") jakarta.persistence.Tuple findMostFrequentCategoryWithAmount(@Param("periodId") Long periodId)
      KPI 1: Most frequent category and its amount. Retrieves the category with the most charges and the total amount for that category for a specific period.
      Parameters:
      periodId - the ID of the period
      Returns:
      a tuple containing the most frequent category and its total amount

    • findCategoryWithHighestAmount

      @Query("SELECT cc.categoryCharge.name AS categoryWithHighestAmount, SUM(cc.amount) AS categoryHighestAmountValue FROM charge cc WHERE cc.period.periodId = :periodId GROUP BY cc.categoryCharge.name ORDER BY SUM(cc.amount) DESC LIMIT 1") jakarta.persistence.Tuple findCategoryWithHighestAmount(@Param("periodId") Long periodId)
      KPI 2: Category with the highest total amount. Retrieves the category with the highest total charge amount for a specific period.
      Parameters:
      periodId - the ID of the period
      Returns:
      a tuple containing the category with the highest total amount and its value

    • findTotalChargesByPeriod

      @Query("SELECT SUM(ch.amount) AS totalChargesByPeriod FROM charge ch WHERE ch.period.periodId = :periodId") BigDecimal findTotalChargesByPeriod(@Param("periodId") Long periodId)
      KPI 3: Total charges by period. Retrieves the total charges for a given period.
      Parameters:
      periodId - the ID of the period
      Returns:
      the total charges as a BigDecimal

    • findMostFrequentFineType

      @Query("SELECT ch.amountSign AS mostFrequentFineType, COUNT(ch.amountSign) AS mostFrequentFineTypeCount FROM charge ch WHERE ch.period.periodId = :periodId GROUP BY ch.amountSign ORDER BY COUNT(ch.amountSign) DESC LIMIT 1") jakarta.persistence.Tuple findMostFrequentFineType(@Param("periodId") Long periodId)
      KPI 4: Most frequent fine type and its count. Retrieves the most frequent fine type and how many times it occurred in the specified period.
      Parameters:
      periodId - the ID of the period
      Returns:
      a tuple containing the most frequent fine type and its count

    • findFinesCountByPeriod

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(ch.fineId) AS finesCountByPeriod FROM charge ch WHERE ch.period.periodId = :periodId AND ch.fineId IS NOT NULL") Long findFinesCountByPeriod(@Param("periodId") Long periodId)
      KPI 5: Total fines count by period. Retrieves the total number of fines for the given period.
      Parameters:
      periodId - the ID of the period
      Returns:
      the total number of fines

    • findCategoryDistributionChart

      @Query("SELECT c.categoryCharge.name AS category, COUNT(c) AS count FROM charge c WHERE c.period.periodId = :periodId GROUP BY c.categoryCharge.name") List<jakarta.persistence.Tuple> findCategoryDistributionChart(@Param("periodId") Long periodId)
      Chart 1: Charges distribution by category. Retrieves the distribution of charges by category for the given period.
      Parameters:
      periodId - the ID of the period
      Returns:
      a list of tuples containing category names and their corresponding counts

    • findFineTypeDistributionChart

      @Query("SELECT c.amountSign AS fineType, COUNT(c) AS count FROM charge c WHERE c.period.periodId = :periodId AND c.fineId IS NOT NULL GROUP BY c.amountSign") List<jakarta.persistence.Tuple> findFineTypeDistributionChart(@Param("periodId") Long periodId)
      Chart 2: Fine type distribution. Retrieves the distribution of fine types for the given period.
      Parameters:
      periodId - the ID of the period
      Returns:
      a list of tuples containing fine types and their corresponding counts

    • findTopLotPayments

      @Query("SELECT c.lotId AS lotId, SUM(c.amount) AS totalPayment FROM charge c WHERE c.period.periodId = :periodId GROUP BY c.lotId ORDER BY SUM(c.amount) DESC") List<jakarta.persistence.Tuple> findTopLotPayments(@Param("periodId") Long periodId)
      Chart 3: Top lot payments by charges. Retrieves the top lots with the highest total payments for charges in a given period.
      Parameters:
      periodId - the ID of the period
      Returns:
      a list of tuples containing lot IDs and their corresponding total payments
